itemDescription: footballer who played for Chester City and Stockport County (1926-2006)

wikipedia_page.main: Johnny Thomas (23 December 1926 – 5 February 2006) was an English footballer, who played as a winger in the Football League for Swindon Town, Chester and Stockport County.

response: *Johnny Thomas (American football, born 1956), former American football player and coach
*Johnny Thomas (footballer) (1926–2006), association football player for Swindon Town, Chester City and Stockport County
*Johnny Thomas (rugby) (died 1954), Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s, 1910s and 1920s
